name: Mini-Game Marathon
description:
Mini-Game Marathon Allows you to compete against your friends in a marathon of Mini-Games to see who is the best. Including addictive games like:

Timezone Tap
Medieval Shielding
Knockout Marathon
Hurdle for Gold
Closing Ceremony Count
The Great Skate
Mini-Game Shootout
Rise for Gold
Fast Fencing
Gymnastics Swiping
